name: Tavern Keeper
equipment: Traveler's clothes, signet ring of tavern, set of artisan tools, belt pouch with 15 gp
equipmentOptions: Choose between brewer's supplies or cook's utensils

features.name: Tavern Network
features.description: You have connections with tavern keepers, innkeepers, and barkeeps across the land. You can often find free lodging and meals at establishments where you're known, and can gather local gossip and information about recent events, prominent figures, and hidden locations.
